discussion: 1. Is homework beneficial? Consider the study data, your personal experience, and other types of information. Explain your answer(s).
2. If homework were banned, what other educational strategies would help students learn classroom material? Explain your answer(s).
3. How has homework been helpful to you personally? How has homework been unhelpful to you personally? Make carefully considered lists for both sides.

3. Consider Joseph Lathan’s argument thathomework promotes inequality.

If your thoughts have not changed, list two to three ways your better understanding of the “other side of the issue” now helps you better argue your position.
